description:
The Guardian Developer Experience team's mission statement is to "Enable teams to focus on delivering value at lightning speed by streamlining infrastructure management".

In this session, the Guardian will describe how we're working to fulfill our mission; we'll give a brief history and a glimpse into the future.

SPEAKER

Akash Askoolum, Senior Software Engineer, The Guardian.

After joining in 2015, Akash worked in the Editorial Tools team, building digital tools used by journalists to author content. Since 2020, Akash has been working in the Developer Experience team, building tools to allow engineers to deliver faster.

***
This talk will be recorded and a link to the recording placed in the Comments shortly after the event.
***
title: Developer Experience at The Guardian
